sentences.en: Conventional wisdom would seem to suggest that companies have no incentive to lengthen the life cycle of their products and reduce the revenue they would get from selling new goods.
sentences.cn: 传统观点似乎认为，企业在延长产品生命周期和减少销售新产品的收入方面是没有动力的。

sentences.en: I need to lengthen this skirt.
The days are beginning to lengthen out.
